Title: Pokémon: Lucario and the Mystery of Mew
Genre: Animation, Action, Adventure, Family, Fantasy, Sci-Fi
Writer: Kathy Pilon, Hideki Sonoda, John Touhey
Actors: Veronica Taylor, Eric Stuart, Amy Birnbaum, Madeleine Blaustein
Plot: When Pikachu is taken to the Tree of Beginnings by the playful Mew, Ash Ketchum and friends are guided to the tree by Lucario, a time-displaced Pokémon who seeks answers regarding the betrayal of his master.
